channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A third of people in England believe in ghosts, survey finds
item.description: National Folklore Survey, the first in over 60 years, found people aged 25-34 most likely to believe in the paranormal It is the time of the year when...

item.title: Ex-EPA head urges US to resist Trump attacks on climate action: ‘We won’t become numb’
item.description: Expanded climate action from cities and states could slash planet-heating pollution despite Trump working against it Ahead of next month’s major Unite...

item.title: Helicopter crashes into field in South Yorkshire

item.title: Senate postpones hearing for Trump’s surgeon general pick after she goes into labor

item.title: Helicopter crashes into field near Doncaster
item.description: Emergency services were called to Ings Lane in Bentley at about 10:15 GMT, police say.

item.title: Afghan man in court after man dies in knife attack
item.description: Safi Dawood is charged with murder and two counts of attempted murder over the Uxbridge incident.

item.title: UK charters flights to get Britons out of Jamaica
item.description: Foreign Secretary Yvette Cooper says "many British nationals were there" during the hurrican's devastation.

item.title: Health officials worried as flu season comes early
item.description: UK Health Security Agency urges people to get vaccinated with cases on the rise.

item.title: McConnell to make Scotland debut against USA
item.description: Edinburgh back row Liam McConnell will make his Scotland debut against the United States in Saturday's opening Nations Series game at Murrayfield.
